import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import ToCart from '../toCart' import ToFavorites from '../toFavorites' const Tiser =({ data, onChange, favorites, onFavorites, cart, onCart }) => { const isFavorite = favorites.includes(data['Артикул']) const isCart = cart.includes(data['Артикул']) return (
{ onChange(catPath())}> }

{{goodName()}}

{data['Цена'] + ' тг'}

) function imgPrefix() { const artcl = data['Артикул'][0] let prefix = './img/' switch(artcl) { case '0': prefix += 'cpu/' break case '1': prefix += 'mb/' break case '2': prefix += 'ram/' break case '3': prefix += 'vc/' break case '4': prefix += 'hdd/' break case '5': prefix += 'bp/' break case '6': prefix += 'cool/' break default: break } return prefix } function goodPath() { const artcl = data['Артикул'][0] let url = '' switch(artcl) { case '0': url = '/cpu/' break case '1': url = '/mb/' break case '2': url = '/ram/' break case '3': url = '/vc/' break case '4': url = '/hdd/' break case '5': url = '/bp/' break case '6': url = '/cool/' break case '7': url = '/set/' break case '8': url = '/comp/' break default: break } url += data['Артикул'] return url } function goodName() { let title = data['Название'] const artcl = data['Артикул'][0] switch(artcl) { case '2': title = data['Тип ОЗУ'] + ' ' + data['Бренд'] + ' ' + data['Объем ОЗУ'] break case '4': title = data['Тип накопителя'] + ' ' + data['Бренд'] + ' ' + data['Объем'] break case '5': title += ' ' + data['Мощность'] + ' Вт' break case '6': title += !data['Сокет'] ? ' ' + data['Диаметр'] + ' мм' : '' break default: break } return title } function catPath() { const artcl = data['Артикул'][0] let url = '' switch(artcl) { case '0': url = '/cpu' break case '1': url = '/mb' break case '2': url = '/ram' break case '3': url = '/vc' break case '4': url = '/hdd' break case '5': url = '/bp' break case '6': url = '/cool' break case '7': url = '/set' break case '8': url = '/comp' break default: break } return url } } export default Tiser
